sen.j: 黄粉（きなこ）は、ダイズを炒って皮を剥き、挽いた穀粉である。
sen.e: Soybean flour is cereal flour made from soybeans that are roasted, peeled and ground.
Soybean flour is cereal flour made from soybeans that are roasted, peeled and ground.
Soybean flour is cereal flour made from soybeans that are roasted, peeled and ground.

sen.j: 加熱により大豆特有の臭みが抜け、香ばしい香りになる。
sen.e: Cooking soybeans will change their unique odor to appetizing aroma.
Soybeans change their unique odor to an appetizing aroma when heated.
Soybeans change their unique odor to an appetizing aroma when heated.

sen.j: 黄大豆を原料にした黄粉は黄褐色を呈するのに対して、青大豆を原料にした黄粉は淡緑色を呈することから青黄粉（あおきなこ）や鶯黄粉（うぐいすきなこ）と呼ばれる。
sen.e: The color of soybean flour made from yellow soybeans is tan, whereas, that made from green soybeans is pale green whereby the latter is referred to as aokinako (green soybean flour) or uguisu kinako ('Japanese bush warbler soybean flour' after the color of the bird's feathers).

The color of soybean flour made from yellow soybeans is tan, whereas, that made from green soybeans is pale green; so the latter is referred to as aokinako (green soybean flour) or uguisu kinako (soybean flour with the color of the wings of a Japanese bush warbler).
sen.cmt: feathers を wings に変更。一部表現を見直し。
sen.e: The color of soybean flour made from yellow soybeans is tan, whereas, that made from green soybeans is pale green; so the latter is referred to as aokinako (green soybean flour) or uguisu kinako (soybean flour with the color of the wings of a Japanese bush warbler).

sen.j: 餅にからめて食べたり、和菓子の原料とする。
sen.e: Soybean flour is used to dust mochi (rice cake) to make a snack and is used as an ingredient for Japanese confectionery.
Soybean flour is used to dust mochi (rice cake) to make a snack and is used as an ingredient for Japanese confectionery.
Soybean flour is used to dust mochi (rice cake) to make a snack and is used as an ingredient for Japanese confectionery.

sen.j: 和菓子で黄粉をそのまま使ったものとしては、きな粉ねじりがある。
sen.e: There is a Japanese confectionery called Kinakonejiri that is made with soybean flour as a main ingredient.
Japanese confectionery called Kinakonejiri is made with soybean flour as a main ingredient.
sen.cmt: 文頭のThere is を除去して文を構成。
sen.e: Japanese confectionery called Kinakonejiri is made with soybean flour as a main ingredient.

sen.j: また、牛乳や豆乳などに混ぜて飲むこともある。
sen.e: Soybean flour is sometimes mixed with milk or soy milk to make beverage.
Soybean flour is sometimes mixed with milk or soy milk to make a beverage.
Soybean flour is sometimes mixed with milk or soy milk to make a beverage.

sen.j: 黄粉には食物繊維が多く含まれているため、便秘改善に役立つ。
sen.e: Since soybean flour is rich in dietary fiber, it is effective as laxative.
Since soybean flour is rich in dietary fiber, it is effective as a laxative.
Since soybean flour is rich in dietary fiber, it is effective as a laxative.

sen.j: また粉にすることで消化が良くなり、大豆の栄養素を効率的に摂取することができる。
sen.e: Additionally, as soybean flour comes in digestible powder form, the nutrients of soybeans are efficiently absorbed.
Additionally, as soybean flour comes in digestible powder form, the nutrients of soybeans are efficiently absorbed.
Additionally, as soybean flour comes in digestible powder form, the nutrients of soybeans are efficiently absorbed.

sen.j: 他にもカルシウム・マグネシウム・カリウム・リン・鉄などのミネラルが多く含まれている。
sen.e: Soybean flour also contains various minerals including calcium, magnesium, kalium, phosphorous and iron.
Soybean flour also contains various minerals such as calcium, magnesium, kalium, phosphorous and iron.
sen.cmt: including をsuch as に変更
sen.e: Soybean flour also contains various minerals such as calcium, magnesium, kalium, phosphorous and iron.

sen.j: その利便性から、近年ではプロスポーツ選手も牛乳に溶かすなどして、よく摂取している。
sen.e: In recent years, with its convenience becoming recognized, among professional athletes often enjoy soybean flour as a part of their diet in various ways including mixing with milk.
These days, with its convenience recognized, professional athletes often enjoy soybean flour in various ways including mixing with milk.
sen.cmt: In recent yeas をThese daysに変更。as a part of their dietは原文にないので除去。
sen.e: These days, with its convenience recognized, professional athletes often enjoy soybean flour in various ways including mixing with milk.

sen.j: 昨今の健康食品ブームにて黒豆から作られる黄粉が人気である。
sen.e: Thanks to the strong trend in consumption of health foods in recent years, kinako made from black beans has become popular.
Thanks to the strong trend in consumption of health foods in recent years, kinako made from black beans has become popular.
Thanks to the strong trend in consumption of health foods in recent years, kinako made from black beans has become popular.

sen.j: 黒豆には抗酸化物質のアントシアンがふくまれている。
sen.e: Black beans contain antioxidant-rich anthocyan.
Black beans contain antioxidant-rich anthocyan.
Black beans contain antioxidant-rich anthocyan.

sen.j: アントシアンには活性酸素を自らが犠牲になって吸収・還元する作用が期待されている。
sen.e: It is expected that anthocyan has a property to absorb and reduce active oxygen.
It is expected that anthocyan has a property to absorb and reduce active oxygen.
It is expected that anthocyan has a property to absorb and reduce active oxygen.

sen.j: ただし、悪性腫瘍や糖尿病等の生活習慣病の予防効果があると謳われている点はまったく医学的な裏付けはなされていない。
sen.e: With respect to the claim that anthocyan is effective in preventing malignant tumor and life-style related diseases such as diabetes, however, it has yet to be medically proven.
With respect to the claim that anthocyan is effective in preventing a malignant tumor and life-style related diseases such as diabetes, however, it has yet to be medically proven.
sen.cmt: malignant tumorの前に冠詞(a)を挿入
sen.e: With respect to the claim that anthocyan is effective in preventing a malignant tumor and life-style related diseases such as diabetes, however, it has yet to be medically proven.

sen.j: また他にも、ゴマや抹茶の配合された黄粉など、様々な黄粉が販売されている。
sen.e: Additionally, various kinako blends including the kinako/sesame seed blend and kinako/matcha green powder tea blend are available.
Additionally, various kinako blends including the kinako/sesame seed blend and kinako/matcha green powder tea blend are available.
Additionally, various kinako blends including the kinako/sesame seed blend and kinako/matcha green powder tea blend are available.
